scripts.pg-android: npm run-script pg-copy && cd _cordova && ../node_modules/.bin/phonegap run android --verbose && cd ../
scripts.pg-android-windows: npm run-script pg-copy && cd _cordova && ..\node_modules\.bin\phonegap run android --verbose && cd ..
scripts.pg-ios: npm run-script pg-copy && cd _cordova && ../node_modules/.bin/phonegap run ios --verbose && cd ../
scripts.pg-setup: ./node_modules/.bin/phonegap create _cordova/ && cd _cordova &&  ../node_modules/.bin/phonegap plugin add org.apache.cordova.inappbrowser && ../node_modules/.bin/phonegap plugin add https://github.com/apache/cordova-plugin-whitelist.git && cd ..
scripts.pg-setup-windows: node_modules\.bin\phonegap create _cordova && cd _cordova &&  ..\node_modules\.bin\phonegap plugin add org.apache.cordova.inappbrowser && ..\node_modules\.bin\phonegap plugin add https://github.com/apache/cordova-plugin-whitelist.git && cd ..
